name: Desideratum
description:
He's dead. 

But he doesn't have to stay that way.

A visual novel about loss, grief, recovery, tea, and watering your plants.

If you want to support progress on Desideratum, here's a link to my ko-fi where you can subscribe or just donate.

http://ko-fi.co/beepsalt

--------------

10/6 - v0.2 released:

  • added title screen
  • added map UI for locations
  • added multiple more place holder images for all locations, made with nightcafe AI/midjourney
  • added post choice sequence
  • added alpha notebook for "chores"
  • changed many lines of dialogue
